pages.text: Notice: Contains information on the following:$(li)Harbinger $(li)Leviathan
Go to the next page. I am trying to keep the formatting consistent here...
A very dangerous boss. Re-awaken with a Nether Star.
High DPS output. It also doesn't help when the laser beam of death ignores most of your armor!
Currently the Leviathan boss is a work in progress.
L_Ender is currently working on this boss but has extensively released teasers, one of which I have linked below as a large button. Good luck on the underwater boss battle!
